summary: A strong follower, to follow you in your adventures.
descriptionHtml:
Hello, I am publishing my first mod that new follower named Cyrus he uses magic, bow and sword. It is good for those who want to start playing around with an ally.
[img]http://static.skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/images/19942-1-1341488360.png[/img]
Race: Breton
Items that it uses: Daedric
Level: 50
Location: Riverwood (in bar)

How to install: it is very simple to inject / cyrus.esp put the file in the Data folder of the game.

NOTE: I'm using 8 update, do not know if the previous catch also, in previous test case back up the save. It also works in Update 9 (1.6.89.0.6)

[size=3][color=red][b]Incompatibility:[/b][/color][/size]
*Never

[size=3][color=red][b]Recommends:[/b][/color][/size]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/14037]
UFO - Ultimate Follower Overhaul[/url] or [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/15524]
Amazing Follower Tweaks[/url]

My other mod:
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/25172]
Benjamin Taylor Follower[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/25228]
Serana Enhanced[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/25254]
Hestla Merchant Upgrade[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/32430]
DRAGONBORN ENB[/url]

Updates: bug fixes, new statistics...
author: Kassane
